contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Telegraph Melts | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Jandek]] | Cover = | Released = 1986 | Recorded = Unknown | Genre = [[Garage rock]]/ [[Punk rock]] | Length = 43:36 | Label = [[Corwood Industries]] | Producer = Corwood Industries | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Foreign Keys]]''<br />(1985) | This album = ''Telegraph Melts''<br />(1986) | Next album = ''[[Follow Your Footsteps]]''<br />(1986) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = ''Sound Choice'' #6 | rev1Score = (favorable) <ref>[http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0750 Sound Choice review]</ref> | rev2 = ''Away From The Pulsebeat'', Winter 1987 | rev2Score = (favorable) <ref>[http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0750 Away from The Pulsebeat review]</ref> | rev3 = ''[[Allmusic]]'' | rev3Score ={{Rating|2.5|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r624357}}</ref> }} '''''Telegraph Melts''''' is the twelfth album and first release of 1986 by musician [[Jandek]]. It was released as [[Corwood Industries]] #0750. ==Track listing== #You – 1:38 #On the Planes – 2:48 #Go to Bed – 2:46 #Ace of Diamonds – 4:43 #Twenty Four – 4:55 #No Slow Ones – 3:00 #Telegraph Melts – 4:04 #Governor Rhodes – 5:06 #Star Up in the Sky – 3:34 #You Painted Your Teeth – 3:04 #Mother's Day Card – 1:37 #The Fly – 3:17 #House Up On the Hill – 2:22 ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0750 Seth Tisue's ''Telegraph Melts'' review] ==Other Uses== * '''[http://www.treiops.com/telegraphmelts/index2.html Telegraph Melts]''' is also the name of a Arlington, VA based chamber-punk band that recorded on Absolutely Kosher in the late 1990s. The band consisted of [[Tsunami (band)|Bob Massey]] on guitar, [[Amy Domingues]] on cello, and [[Devin Ocampo]] as percusionist. It was in existence from October 1997 until May 2000, during which time they released three albums. [[Category:Jandek albums]] [[Category:Corwood Industries albums]] [[Category:1986 albums]]
